Job Title: Asset Manager

Location: Chicago, IL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Finance, Sales

Description:
Evergreen Real Estate Group is looking to hire for the role of Asset Manager, who will lead efforts in providing leadership with property-level monitoring and updates, identification of risks and recommendations for mitigation, and property-level transition action planning between Ownership and Management. 
The Asset Manager will work directly with the VP, Underwriting & Portfolio Management as well as Ownership and Property Management to enhance the portfolio’s overall financial health, stability, and growth. 
Key Responsibilities:• Develop and execute asset management strategies to optimize the performance of the multifamily portfolio.• Collaborate with Vice President and Regional Directors of Property Management to troubleshoot and optimize property and portfolio operations.• Conduct regular site visits as needed to include but not limited to review of: curb appeal, the status of CapEx projects, common area and vacant unit conditions, and personnel issues. • Review, analyze and report on financial statements in conjunction with site visit reports.• Oversee property-level transition planning for acquisitions in collaboration with the Director of Property Integration and the property management operations team.• Working with VP, Underwriting & Portfolio Management and Regional Directors of Property Management, create, oversee, and implement strategic business plans and programs for multifamily properties.• Participate in due diligence efforts for potential acquisitions and dispositions.• Perform other duties, as directed or required.
Qualifications:• Bachelor’s degree in Real Estate, Portfolio/Asset Management, Finance, or related field.• 3-5 years of progressive experience in multifamily asset management or operations with demonstrated success in implementation of asset business plans and/or improving property and portfolio performance.• Knowledge of affordable housing and financing programs.• Strong understanding of Microsoft Excel and Powerpoint. • Experience with management software such as BI, RealPage, or Yardi. • Excellent oral and written communication skills.• Excellent critical thinking and problem-solving skills.
Benefits and Compensation:• Competitive salary plus bonus potential• Benefits package includes medical, dental, vision, STD/LTD, AD&D, life, 401k+ match• PTO and sick time• Pre-tax commuter benefits
Work Location:• This role will be hybrid and based in Chicago, Illinois. • Candidate must be willing to travel at least 50% of time. 
Founded in 1999, Evergreen Real Estate Group is a fully integrated real estate company that develops, acquires, and manages affordable and market-rate multifamily communities across 12 states: Colorado, Florida, Illinois, Indiana, Minnesota, North Carolina, Ohio, Pennsylvania, Tennessee, Vermont, Virginia, and Wisconsin. Today, Evergreen owns and manages more than 110 properties and over 12,000 units of multifamily housing, including conventional market-rate and affordable communities for families, seniors, and disabled residents, as well as newly built Class A, assisted living, and memory care facilities.

Experience Level (if available): None
